Description: Ring foot and wall sherd of East Greek (?) pottery cup; fine pink-buff clay with some silver mica; probably reserved on the outside; interior glazed with large reserved central disc; inside of foot glazed; two red-fired lines on underside; incised inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 476)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.873)
